form.name: rutf_available_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Malnutrition> RUTF Available Two

field.name: Does the child have any of the following signs or conditions?
Complicated severe acute malnutrition
field.options: For children < 6 months of age | Visible severe wasting OR | Oedema of both feet For children ≥ 6 months of age | MUAC < 11.5 cm OR oedema of both feet OR visible severe wasting AND | Poor appetite OR pneumonia OR persistent diarrhea OR dysentery OR ear infection OR generalized oedema OR temperature of <35.5 or ≥ 38.5 | Click here to take action

field.name: Uncomplicated severe acute malnutrition
field.options: For children ≥ 6 months of age | MUAC < 11.5 cm OR oedema of both feet OR visible severe wasting AND | Some appetite (able to finish RUTF) AND | No medical complications | Click here to take action

field.name: Moderate acute malnutrition or underweight
field.options: For children ≥ 6 months of age | MUAC 11.5 – < 12 cm OR | Weight for age < -2 z-score | Click here to take acition

field.name: No acute malnutrition, and not underweight
field.options: For children ≥ 6 months of age | MUAC ≥ 12.5 cm OR | Weight for age > -2 z-score | Click here to take action
